attr.title: Space Moth DX
attr.desc: Betrayed by her cut-throat crew, Luna Starr - former Space Pirate Captain turned bounty hunter - has a score to settle. As Luna, travel to 5 exotic planets to track down your mutinous mates, and face them in Bullet Hell dogfights to the death!
attr.inst: Download on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/425340/Space_Moth_DX/ and place Space Moth DX.exe inside the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/425340/Space_Moth_DX/) and place Space Moth DX.exe inside the gamedata folder.
